dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh my gosh, A, you are not going to believe this place I just visited!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh my gosh, A, you are not going to believe this place I just visited!

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Uh oh. Another "life-altering" trip, B? What's the big deal this time?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Uh oh. Another life-altering trip, B? What's the big deal this time?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: No, but seriously! Imagine, like, this city nestled right between the Adriatic and these massive mountains. The views are just... unreal.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, but seriously! Imagine, like, this city nestled right between the Adriatic and these massive mountains. The views are just... unreal.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: This charming city combines the old-world stone streets with stunning views from the limestone mountain behind.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, a city by the sea with a big hill. Been there, done that.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, a city by the sea with a big hill. Been there, done that.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Not just a hill! It’s a limestone mountain with these incredible, ancient castle walls going all the way up! Venetian engineers built them, apparently.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Not just a hill! It's a limestone mountain with these incredible, ancient castle walls going all the way up! Venetian engineers built them, apparently.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: You can climb this mountain with relative ease, thanks to extensive castle walls, all extending out from the remains of a castle at the top.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Venetian engineers. Sounds like a lot of, you know, walking.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Venetian engineers. Sounds like a lot of, you know, walking.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: It's actually pretty easy! And there’s, um, a strategically important castle at the very top. The remains are super cool.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's actually pretty easy! And there's, um, a strategically important castle at the very top. The remains are super cool.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: You can climb this mountain with relative ease, thanks to extensive castle walls, all extending out from the remains of a castle at the top.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: "Super cool." Right. Did you, like, fly in on a private jet?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Super cool. Right. Did you, like, fly in on a private jet?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Nah, bussed it from Dubrovnik, surprisingly quick. But, I mean, most people actually arrive by boat, like these fancy yachts.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Nah, bussed it from Dubrovnik, surprisingly quick. But, I mean, most people actually arrive by boat, like these fancy yachts.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: I arrived by bus from Dubrovnik, as many do, and left by plane. Most people, it seems, arrive by boat.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: The real draw is the old walled city, though. Roman settlers, centuries ago. It's got this totally unique history, not just, you know, another Dubrovnik.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The real draw is the old walled city, though. Roman settlers, centuries ago. It's got this totally unique history, not just, you know, another Dubrovnik.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The main attraction, of course, is the walled old part of the city. Not as elaborate or extensive as Dubrovnik, it has its own charm.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: "Not just another Dubrovnik." High praise. And where did you stay, Mr. "unique history"? A five-star boutique?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Not just another Dubrovnik. High praise. And where did you stay, Mr. unique history? A five-star boutique?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Hostel Old Town Kotor! Seriously, I know, but it was amazing. The people, um, were lovely, the rooms were renovated...
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Hostel Old Town Kotor! Seriously, I know, but it was amazing. The people, um, were lovely, the rooms were renovated...
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: I stayed, and highly recommend, Hostel Old Town Kotor. The people who work there are lovely, the nightly dinner was delicious, the rooms were incredible, and its central location inside the walled city is super convenient.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: A hostel. I'm sure it was delightful.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A hostel. I'm sure it was delightful.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: And they had authentic Montenegrin dinner every night! Delicious, I swear. Plus, there's a Michelin-starred seafood place in town!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And they had authentic Montenegrin dinner every night! Delicious, I swear. Plus, there's a Michelin-starred seafood place in town!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: the nightly dinner was delicious... Restaurants abound, as youd expect, with a variety of cuisines.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Seafood. In, um, wherever that is. I guess the local wines were, like, "superior" too?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Seafood. In, um, wherever that is. I guess the local wines were, like, superior too?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: They actually were! Way better than Mostar's, even. You should totally go, A.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: They actually were! Way better than Mostar's, even. You should totally go, A.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: I wasnt quite as impressed with the food here as I was in nearby Mostar.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, yeah. I'll add it to the list. Somewhere after "do the dishes."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, yeah. I'll add it to the list. Somewhere after do the dishes.
